channel.title: Combined Economist RSS Feed
channel.description: Combined feed of the latest articles from Economist with archived links

item.title: How America’s Democrats might win back power
item.description: The party is trying to talk less about pronouns, more about prices

item.title: Five dangerous fault lines divide Trump and Zelensky
item.description: They are likely to feature in the Oval Office showdown

item.title: Indonesia could be on the brink of something nasty
item.description: The president should heed protesters rather than crushing them

item.title: A lesson in Trump-charming
item.description: South Korea’s new president avoids a Zelensky moment in the White House

item.title: China’s urban planners could determine the future of city life
item.description: They are betting big on interconnected city clusters

item.title: How Israel’s arms exports have made it sanctions-proof
item.description: Israel gains diplomatic insurance by supplying weapons crucial to Europe’s defence

item.title: Five Republican factions jostle for the president’s favour
item.description: He has a unique ability to keep them marching in the same direction

item.title: What if artificial intelligence is just a “normal” technology?
item.description: Its rise might yet follow the path of previous technological revolutions
